description.full_text:
Product:
1 square tile format
Exclusive cork construction 'Duo Core' for more comfort and acoustical performances (15dB of impact sound reduction)
ProtecShield™ surface treatment: easy to clean and no wax needed
Installation:
Removable installation with tackifier - suitable for raised floor
Direct on ceramics if joint <5mm

Application:
Ideal for high traffic areas: shops, offices, lobby, ...

Environment:
100% reciklabilno
55% recycled content
Cork: Renewable raw material
TVOC <10μg/m3
Phtalate free

Construction:
1. ProtecShield™: ultra matt finish micro scratch resistant
2. 0.70 mm wear layer
3. Printing film
4. Duo core layer construction
5. Anti Slip wafle backing
Removable flooring to meet your needs
Product :
5 sizes : including herringbone and XL planks
Exclusive construction « Duo Core », reinforced with a fiber glass for comfort & stability
ProtecShield™ varnish  :  natural look and easy to clean
Installation :
Removable installation with tackifier - suitable for raised floor
Direct on ceramic if joint <4mm
Application :
Ideal for intense traffic areas : office, hotel, shops - european class 34-43
Environment :
100% reciklabilno
35% recycled content
TVOC <10µg/m3
Phtalate free

specs.FORMAT DETAILS: Plank, Square tile, XL Square tile
